narrative.inOrderTo: assure that the basic functionality of disasterassistance.gov is working
narrative.iWantTo: run the daily regressions at least twice a day

scenario.title: Homepage - Header - All the menu links on the "Get Assistance" tab

examples.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the <menuLinks> in the Get Assistance tab
Then the <menuLinks> page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the address look-up in the Get Assistance tab
Then the address look-up page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the find assistance in the Get Assistance tab
Then the find assistance page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the apply online in the Get Assistance tab
Then the apply online page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the check your status in the Get Assistance tab
Then the check your status page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the forms of assistance in the Get Assistance tab
Then the forms of assistance page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the community leaders in the Get Assistance tab
Then the community leaders page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the other recovery help in the Get Assistance tab
Then the other recovery help page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the application checklist in the Get Assistance tab
Then the application checklist page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on the forms in the Get Assistance tab
Then the forms page should open correctly

scenario.title: Homepage - Key Links - Main links on homepage to assert that the pages open correctly

examples.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on <mainLinksItem> within the main links bar
Then the <mainLinksItem> page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on find assistance within the main links bar
Then the find assistance page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on apply online within the main links bar
Then the apply online page should open correctly
Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on check status within the main links bar
Then the check status page should open correctly

scenario.title: Homepage - Currently declared disasters - States in the declared disaster map are clickable
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am viewing the declared disaster map
Then states with disasters should be clickable

scenario.title: Homepage - Currently declared disasters - The declared states on the declared disaster map
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am viewing the declared disaster map
Then states with disasters should be clickable
Then I should be able to view the list of the declared states

scenario.title: Homepage - Find Local Resources flows correctly
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I am attempting to find local resources
Then information on resources should be visible

scenario.title: News Feeds - All of the titles on the page
scenario.step: When I am on the News Feeds landing page node
Then all of the sub-titles should show on the page

scenario.title: Community Leaders - Results of the quick search items

examples.step: Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a <quickSearch> item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item

values.value: Infrastructure, Utilities, and Other Public Assistance

examples.step: Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Community Preparedness item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Disaster Recovery Resources item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Emergency Shelter and Housing item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a How Can You Help? item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item
examples.example: {quickSearch=Infrastructure, Utilities, and Other Public Assistance, category=NWD, skip=}
examples.step: Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I click on a Infrastructure, Utilities, and Other Public Assistance item on the Community Leaders page
Then the results should include the search words for that item

scenario.title: Homepage - Address Look-Up - Declared disasters
scenario.step: Given I am on the declared disasters DAC page
When I type the declared disaster into the address look-up bar
Then I should get the results for the given disaster

scenario.title: Address Look-Up - Declared disasters
scenario.step: Given I am on the declared disasters DAC page
When I type the declared disaster into the address look-up bar from the Address Look-Up page
Then I should get the results for the given disaster

scenario.title: Find Assistance - Benefits results display according to use cases
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance page
When I choose only Employment
Then I should obtain 9 results and see all the content under the accordions

scenario.title: Find Assistance - Dynamically verify results of the questionnaire
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance page
When I fully complete the questionnaire
Then I should accumulate the same number of results as the text on the Get Results button

scenario.title: Find Assistance - All the functionality of the FOA questionnaire
scenario.step: Given I am on the Find Assistance page
When I fully complete the questionnaire
Then I should be able to see all of the content
When I click next
Then the 3 accordions should have content visible
When I click apply now
Then the DAC page should load

scenario.title: News Feeds - FEMA Twitter feed is present
scenario.step: Given I am on the News Feed page
When I am viewing the FEMA Twitter feed
Then the most recent tweets should be displayed

scenario.title: Forms of Assistance - Category Type filter with the first seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Category Type to check the first seven category types
Then 42 results should appear

scenario.title: Forms of Assistance - Category Type filter with the next eight types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Category Type to check the next eight category types
Then 53 results should appear

scenario.title: Forms of Assistance - Federal Agency filter with the first seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Federal Agency to check the first seven federal agencies
Then 40 results should appear

scenario.title: Forms of Assistance - Federal Agency filter with the next seven types
scenario.step: Given I am on the Forms of Assistance page
When I click on Federal Agency to check the next seven federal agencies
Then 37 results should appear

scenario.title: Homepage - "Apply Online" DAC page includes mobile flag
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on Apply Online
Then the DAC page with the mobile string should appear

scenario.title: Homepage - "Check Status" DAC page includes mobile flag
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I click on Check Status
Then the DAC page with the mobile string should appear

scenario.title: Community Leaders - Type keyword into search bar
scenario.step: Given I am on the Community Leaders page on Disaster Assistance
When I type a keyword into the search bar
Then the results should include the search words for that item

scenario.title: Homepage - USA search feeds display results
scenario.step: Given I am on the Disaster Assistance homepage
When I type into the USA search box
Then I should be able to see results for that search
